text: When I was hash-tagging Howth #howthegrinchstolechristmas came up as a suggestion, lol.
When Cindy Lou Who kisses the Grinch's cheek...day my own mother told me how disgusting my skin & flesh is...
Maybe if my dad could've actually told the time he was waking up early to take the car to get fixed...#HowTheGrinchStoleChristmas
..to finish my Christmas Marathon tonight. On MAY 3RD?!#HowTheGrinchStoleChristmas#Animated#LiveAction
